body:
If anyone here has any old CSGO skins (of any gun) that they wont need/use anymore
(even if its a blue and its minimal wear to field tested to well worn to battle-scarred ill take it)
send it to me here: https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=194757742&token=pW-Hpsa0

(i started playing CSGO since a month ago and im Silver 2, ik im bad ;-;)
*Im also looking for a UMP 45 Grand Prix too cuz its a sexy skin and i use the UMP 45 alot as an SMG
